parts.text: {"word":"okay","priority":"★★★","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"adjective","definition":"良い、大丈夫な、問題ない","english_definition":"satisfactory but not exceptionally good; acceptable.","examples":[{"sentence":"Is everything okay?","translation":"すべて大丈夫ですか？"},{"sentence":"The food was okay, but nothing special.","translation":"食事はまあまあだったけど、特別なことはなかった。"},{"sentence":"It's okay to make mistakes.","translation":"間違いを犯しても大丈夫です。"}],"collocations":["everything is okay (すべて大丈夫)","it's okay (大丈夫だよ)","okay with (～に賛成)","okay by me (私は構わない)"],"synonyms":["acceptable","satisfactory","all right","passable","adequate"],"antonyms":["bad","terrible","unacceptable"]},{"part_of_speech":"adverb","definition":"うまく、順調に","english_definition":"in a satisfactory or acceptable manner.","examples":[{"sentence":"The plan is progressing okay.","translation":"計画は順調に進んでいます。"},{"sentence":"Did the meeting go okay?","translation":"会議はうまくいきましたか？"}],"collocations":["go okay (うまくいく)","progress okay (順調に進む)"],"synonyms":["well","satisfactorily","all right"],"antonyms":["badly","poorly"]},{"part_of_speech":"interjection","definition":"承知しました、了解しました、いいよ、わかった","english_definition":"used to express agreement, acceptance, or understanding.","examples":[{"sentence":"Okay, I'll do it.","translation":"わかった、私がやります。"},{"sentence":"Okay, see you later.","translation":"わかった、またね。"},{"sentence":"Okay, that sounds good.","translation":"いいよ、それでいいと思う。"}],"collocations":["okay, then (わかった、それじゃあ)","okay, I see (わかった、理解した)"],"synonyms":["all right","agreed","understood","very well"],"antonyms":["no","refused"]},{"part_of_speech":"noun","definition":"承認、許可","english_definition":"approval or agreement.","examples":[{"sentence":"I need to get the okay from my boss.","translation":"上司の承認を得る必要があります。"},{"sentence":"Did you get the okay to start the project?","translation":"プロジェクトを開始する許可は得られましたか？"}],"collocations":["get the okay (許可を得る)","give the okay (許可を与える)"],"synonyms":["approval","permission","agreement","consent"],"antonyms":["rejection","denial"]}],"etymology":{"value":"起源は不明だが、1830年代にアメリカで流行した略語の誤用が有力視されている。当時、新聞記事などで意図的に綴りを間違えた略語を使うことが流行しており、「all correct」を「oll korrect」と綴り、さらに略して「O.K.」と表記したのが始まりとされる。","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/ˌoʊˈkeɪ/","syllables":"o-kay"},"inflection":{"notes":"名詞の複数形は okays または okays, 動詞として使う場合は okayed, okaying, okays"},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「**okay**」は非常に汎用性の高い単語で、形容詞、副詞、間投詞、名詞として使用できます。意味も「良い」「大丈夫」「承知しました」「承認」など多岐にわたります。日常会話で頻繁に使われ、フォーマルな場面では「acceptable」「satisfactory」「agreement」などのより適切な表現を選ぶことが推奨されます。","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"✗ I'm okay for go.","correct":"✓ I'm okay to go.","note":"「～するのに大丈夫」という場合は、to不定詞を使います。"},{"incorrect":"✗ Is all okay?","correct":"✓ Is everything okay?","note":"「すべて大丈夫ですか？」と尋ねる場合は、"everything" を主語にします。"},{"incorrect":"✗ He gave me the okayed.","correct":"✓ He gave me the okay.","note":"名詞として使う場合は、"okay" の形をそのまま使います。過去分詞形は動詞として使う場合のみです。"}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["ok (より短い形。意味はokayと同じ)","okey-dokey (よりくだけた表現。okayを強調した言い方)"],"idioms_phrases":["okay by me (私は構わない)","everything's okay (すべて大丈夫)"],"priority":"★★★"},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"A1","frequency_google_ngram":"非常に高頻度 (Very high frequency) - 英語の最重要基本語彙の一つ。","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"A1","text":"「**okay**」は、とてもよく使う言葉で、「大丈夫」「わかった」「いいよ」という意味があります。例えば、誰かに「Are you okay?（大丈夫ですか？）」と聞いたり、何かを頼まれたときに「Okay, I'll do it.（わかった、やるよ）」と言ったりします。とても便利な言葉なので、ぜひ覚えて使ってみてください。"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"Are you **okay** with the new plan?","translation":"新しい計画に賛成ですか？","type":"adjective","meaning_category":"良い、大丈夫な"},{"sentence":"The car is running **okay** now.","translation":"車は今、順調に動いています。","type":"adverb","meaning_category":"うまく、順調に"},{"sentence":"**Okay**, let's start the meeting.","translation":"わかりました、会議を始めましょう。","type":"interjection","meaning_category":"承知しました"},{"sentence":"I got the **okay** from my manager to proceed.","translation":"マネージャーから進める許可を得ました。","type":"noun","meaning_category":"承認"}]}
